subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Five months after Linsanity took New York and the N.B.A. by storm, it’s possible the Knicks may decide not to match Jeremy Lin’s three-year, $25.1 million offer sheet from Houston.
snippet: Five months after Linsanity took New York and the N.B.A. by storm, it’s possible the Knicks may decide not to match Jeremy Lin’s three-year, $25.1 million offer sheet from Houston.
